review: A great notebook, until you try to open it by pulling on the rings themselves instead of the little black lever.  At 75 years old, I figured I shouldn't be able to bend steel, but I did, and had to order another notebook.
productTitle: Avery Heavy-Duty View Binder with 2-Inch One Touch EZD Rings, Sea Foam Green, 1 Binder (79345)
